text: “(Ndipo adapita ku Iguputo). Choncho pamene adalowa kwa iye (Yûsuf), adati: “E inu olemekezeka! Masautso atikhudza, ife ndi maanja athu; choncho tabwera ndi chuma chopanda pake. Tidzadzireni mlingo (ngakhale chuma chathucho chili chopanda pake), ndipo tithandizeni mwaulere. Ndithu Allah amawalipira othandiza mwaulere.”
